column6: STRANDED, and without anyone who can understand what's coming out of his mouth, it's Groot vs The Cosmos in a trek to get his best friend back! Featuring a special guest star who's REALLY OUTTA THIS WORLD! Groot may look intimidating, but, trust us, he's all bark!
column8: | artist:Brian Kesinger | writer:Jeff Loveness | penciller (cover):Declan Shalvey
